input_args.text: 'Written by Daniel McAdams Wednesday October 26, 2016 Virginia State Senator Richard Black was curious about why the US seemed to be attacking only secular countries in the Middle East. Why attack Libya? Why Syria? So he decided to go over to Syria and see for himself. After meeting Syrian president Assad and speaking favorably about the situation with Christians under his rule, Sen. Black earned himself a place on ISIS\'s "enemy list." For not taking the Washington line that "Assad must go" he also earned a place on the Washington Post\'s "enemy list." Are we on the wrong side in Syria? Today, with Sen. Black, on the Liberty Report: Copyright © 2016 by RonPaul Institute. Permission to reprint in whole or in part is gladly granted, provided full credit and a live link are given.'
